name: Heroes of Eterna - Tactics
description:
The royal family has been kidnapped by foul monsters! It's up to the remaining Prince/Princess to put together a team and venture forth to rescue them while slaying the foes encountered on the journey.

Heroes of Eterna - Tactics blends turn-based tactics style combat with Legend of Zelda style map exploration. Each time you start, the world map is randomly generated, each map spawning various foes for you to battle. Create a team of four from a diverse cast of character classes and abilities.

This game was initially built as a spin-off title to my main project (Heroes of Eterna) for a 30 jam. It is currently pretty early in development, though largely a playable experience. It is on hold while I continue working on the core project. I have a number of updates and features are planned for this game before an eventual full release.

Planned Updates:

  • Class Unlocks/Progression
  • Region Specific Monsters
  • Bosses
  • Enhanced Combat (Damage variance, strengths/weaknesses etc...)
  • AI Improvements
  • More Classes
  • More Skills
  • More Maps
  • More Regions
  • More Music/SFX

Wish List:

  • Experience/Leveling system
  • Town/Hub zone between "Dungeons"
  • Broad plot with goals spanning multiple "Dungeons"
  • Multi-Region dungeons
  • Dialog System
  • Other stuff I haven't thought of yet! XD
  • Vita port
  • Mac/Linux port
